sets.name: Choice Scarf
sets.description:
248 HP EVs ensure that Ditto will be able to use Struggle four times before fainting, and 252 Defense EVs minimize Struggle damage from an opposing Ditto. The minimum possible Speed allows Imposter to not activate first and therefore allow Ditto to have more Transform PP.

This is a sample set, stay tuned for future updates!

sets.name: Specially Defensive
sets.description: Defense avoids OHKO from Krookodile’s Knock Off.

sets.name: Choice Specs
sets.description: Timid can be run to trap Tinkaton, but outspeeds nothing else of note.

sets.name: Offensive Pivot
sets.description: 44 Defense EVs as a benchmark to avoid the 2HKO from Adamant Life Orb Mamoswine whilst maintaining speed.

sets.name: Offensive Pivot
sets.description: EV spread avoids an OHKO from Cobalion’s Close Combat while still outpacing Jolly Lucario.

sets.name: Physically Defensive
sets.description: 252 HP EVs and 80 Special Defense EVs allow Amoonguss to avoid the 2HKO from Choice Specs Primarina's Hydro Pump after Stealth Rock and guarantee that it survives Mega Manectric's Overheat after Stealth Rock. Seed Bomb lets it handle Calm Mind Primarina

sets.name: Offensive Pivot
sets.description: 244 Atk / 12 SpD / 252 Spe is an alternate EV spread takes on +1 Nihilego after Stealth Rock when holding Assault Vest.

sets.name: Defensive
sets.description:
Speed investment outspeeds Specs Primarina and Modest Magnezone. 252 HP / 160 SpD / 96 Spe is an alternative specially defensive spread.

This is a sample set, stay tuned for future updates!

sets.name: Offensive Pivot
sets.description: Investment in defense helps it stomach a hit from Choice Scarf Zarude. Can go max max offensive too.

sets.name: Swords Dance
sets.description: Bulk Up can be run in order to give Zarude more bulk while setting up.
